name: Debug Pig Scale
prompt: Spawn a pig, then make it 3 times larger

verify.code: () => { const game = window.__VOXEL_GAME__; const pig = game?.animals?.find(a => a.constructor.name === 'Pig'); const scale = pig?.mesh?.scale?.x || 0; console.log('DEBUG: Pig scale is', scale); return { success: scale >= 2.8, message: `Pig scale is ${scale}` }; }
